column2: Table 5#5#5# Private Fixed Investment in Equipment and Software

column3: Private fixed investment in equipment and software
General industrial, including materials handling, equipment
Electrical transmission, distribution, and industrial apparatus
Other trucks, buses, and truck trailers \3\
Less: Sale of equipment scrap, excluding autos
Private fixed investment in equipment and software
Less: Dealers' margin on used equipment
Net purchases of used equipment from government
Plus: Net sales of used equipment
Equals: Private fixed investment in new equipment and software

column2: 1. Excludes software "embedded," or bundled, in computers and other equipment.
2. For 1929-45, includes electrical transmission, distribution, and industrial
3. Includes net purchases of used vehicles; additional detail is available in table 7.2.5B.
